{"id":1533907001,"question_id":3639,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"22 hours, 53 minutes","timestamp":1738865397,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"158 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1533907001/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zero Array Transformation I","memory":"325.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isZeroArray(vector<int>& nums, vector<vector<int>>& queries) {\n        //queries[i] = [li, ri].\n        int n = nums.size();\n        vector<int> freq(n+1, 0);\n        for(auto q: queries) {\n            freq[q[0]]++;\n            freq[q[1]+1]--;\n        }\n        int op = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<n; i++) {\n            op += freq[i];\n            if( op < nums[i] ) \n                return false; \n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zero-array-transformation-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
